node.title: Mentoring Godly Men
node.description: In an age of widespread gender confusion, passive men and absent fathers, there is a desperate need for godly mentorship to disciple boys and men into Christ-like manhood. This seminar will paint a portrait of a godly man and outline the disciplines that build such character. Principles of effective mentoring will be discussed, highlighting the crucial aspects of giving and receiving mentorship. Illustrations will be shared from Scripture, history and personal experience in raising sons.
